body_html: @ezyang I figured out a compromise for (3): I've replaced the old TH implementation with the new implementation in this PR. I modified TensorImpl::set_sizes_and_strides to match the old THTensor_(resizeNd) semantics -- could you take a look and see if this is okay?
body_text: @ezyang I figured out a compromise for (3): I've replaced the old TH implementation with the new implementation in this PR. I modified TensorImpl::set_sizes_and_strides to match the old THTensor_(resizeNd) semantics -- could you take a look and see if this is okay?
body: @ezyang I figured out a compromise for (3): I've replaced the old TH implementation with the new implementation in this PR. I modified `TensorImpl::set_sizes_and_strides` to match the old `THTensor_(resizeNd)` semantics -- could you take a look and see if this is okay?
